text:
Hi Arran,
I'm good thank you, how are you?
I've had 2 interviews, a few weeks ago, they went well. I've got an unconditional offer from Kingston, and an offer from Westminster :slightly_smiling_face:
I thought my Westminster interview went really bad because other candidates had a lot of work in their portfolio and mine was JUST art work and very limited architecture drawings (so next time I need to make sure I have the correct sort of portfolio) but I did get an offer in the end so it was okay
In terms of interviews, I don't need much support but thank you for offering! I'm currently preparing for my mock exams, hopefully they go well..
Are you doing anything interesting atm, in terms of work? or in general!
